author: martin
msg: De facto implementations of getnameinfo() return the error code in their
return value. See isc.org's bind9, or FreeBSD's lib/libc/net/getnameinfo.c
Implementations that set h_errno a simply broken.

if you aren't building for 9x/ME binary compatibility.
